title: Mr. Casual: A Dark Cheating Romance
description: In this bite-sized dark and toxic cheating romance, there's no nice guy who comes in and rescues her. . . When powerful Mayor Ellis Christianson gets engaged, his in-love and overlooked secretary Maggie Collins finally calls it quits on their casual, no-strings-attached relationship.But she wasn't expecting her hard, brutal boss to refuse to let her go. . .This is a novelette/short-story length 'villain gets the girl' unrepentant cheater romance with dark content. Please check the Author's Note at the back of the book.
author: Gable Jones
